effect.modulargolems.atomic_boost.descri: Increase golem attack damage and movement speed
modifier.modulargolems.add_slot_allthemo: Add 1 upgrade slot. Only once per golem.
Add 1 upgrade slot. Only once per golem.
modifier.modulargolems.add_slot_netherit: Add 1 upgrade slot. Only once per golem.
modifier.modulargolems.add_slot_unobtain: Add 1 upgrade slot. Only once per golem.
modifier.modulargolems.add_slot_vibraniu: Add 1 upgrade slot. Only once per golem.
modifier.modulargolems.ancient_anchor.de: Deal fall attack, cause shockwaves, and stun targets
modifier.modulargolems.ancient_remnant_r: Reforge: Consumes body material to repair itself at the cost of max health. Consumption be restored with ingot.
modifier.modulargolems.ancient_remnant_s: Summon sandstorm at target position. Attacks multiple targets
modifier.modulargolems.apostle.desc: Apostle Upgrades will not consume slot
modifier.modulargolems.armor_penetration: Attack has %s%% chance to bypass armor and shields
modifier.modulargolems.atomic_fueling.de: Consume [%s] to heal %s HP, and boost attack and speed by %s for %s seconds. Makes golem immune to irradiated effect.
modifier.modulargolems.bell.desc: When the golem wants to attack, it will ring its bell, attracting all enemies and light them up.
modifier.modulargolems.carminite.desc: After being hurt, turn invisible and invinsible for %s seconds
modifier.modulargolems.cauldron.desc: Repeated potion upgrades will no longer consume upgrade slots.
modifier.modulargolems.cloud_forming.des: Deal more damage to targets with higher health
modifier.modulargolems.conduit.desc: When in water: Reduce damage taken to %s%%. Every %s seconds, deal %s conduit damage to target in water/rain remotely. Boost following stats:
modifier.modulargolems.damage_cap.desc: Damage taken are limited within %s%% of max health.
modifier.modulargolems.ender_guardian_vo: Summon vortex and void rune toward multiple targets
modifier.modulargolems.ender_sight.desc: Golem can see through wall and ceilings.
modifier.modulargolems.explosion_resista: Explosion damage taken reduced to %s%% of original, and will not break blocks.
modifier.modulargolems.fiery.desc: Deal %s%% fire damage to mobs not immune to fire
modifier.modulargolems.fire_blast.desc: Summon Fire Blast Trap in the front
modifier.modulargolems.fire_immune.desc: Immune to fire damage. Floats in Lava.
modifier.modulargolems.fire_tornado.desc: Summon Fire Tornado Trap toward target position
modifier.modulargolems.float.desc: Golem floats in water and lava instead of sinking
modifier.modulargolems.free_movement.des: Golem will not be stuck by blocks or caramel
modifier.modulargolems.freezing.desc: Get Ice Blade and Ice Thorn enchantment effects. Immune to freezing damage.
modifier.modulargolems.gum_shooter.desc: Shoot gumballs at targets dealing %s damage
modifier.modulargolems.harbinger_death_b: When target is faraway, shoot Death Beam toward target.
modifier.modulargolems.harbinger_missile: When target is faraway, shoot Homing Missile toward target.
modifier.modulargolems.haunted.desc: Might summon haunted armor servant when killing enemies. Higher chance to summon when killed target is armored
modifier.modulargolems.hell_cloud.desc: Summon Hell cloud on target position
modifier.modulargolems.hepatizon_defense: Increase golem armor temporarily after taking damage
modifier.modulargolems.hostility_core.de: All other hostility upgrades don't consume upgrade slots
First level of each kind of potion upgrades don't consume upgrade slot
modifier.modulargolems.ice_dragonsteel_a: Freeze, slow, and knockback attacker when attacked
modifier.modulargolems.ignis_attack.desc: Stack Blazing Brande effect and regenerate health when hit target. When health is lower than half, direct damage bypasses armor.
modifier.modulargolems.ignis_fireball.de: When target is faraway, shoot Ignis fireballs toward target.
modifier.modulargolems.immunity.desc: Immune to all damage, except void damage. Mobs won't attack invulnerable golem.
modifier.modulargolems.leviathan_blast_p: Ccreate blast portal at target position. Attacks multiple targets
modifier.modulargolems.lightning_dragons: Summon lightning bolt to attack target
modifier.modulargolems.magic_resistant.d: Magic damage taken reduced to %s%% of original
modifier.modulargolems.maledictus_attack: Golem melee damage bypass armor. Stack rage counter after dealing damage, up to %s layers
modifier.modulargolems.maledictus_earthq: Jump and cause earthquake on landing, summoning halberds
modifier.modulargolems.mana_burst.desc: Shoot mana burst toward faraway targets dealing %s%% attack damage, costing %s mana
modifier.modulargolems.mana_mending.desc: Get %s regeneration at a %s mana/hp efficiency
Increase golem attack temporarily after inflicting damage
modifier.modulargolems.manyullyn_defense: Increase golem attack temporarily after taking damage
modifier.modulargolems.mechanical_engine: Consumes fuels to power the golem up.
When burning fuels, increase attack damage by %s%%
modifier.modulargolems.mechanical_mobili: When burning fuels, increase speed by %s%%
modifier.modulargolems.netherite_monstro: Jump and cause earthquake on landing
modifier.modulargolems.pickup.desc: Golems will pickup items and experiences within %s blocks and give them to you. See Patchouli for full documentation. The golem may destroy items if it find nowhere to store them
modifier.modulargolems.pickup_mending.de: When a golem picks up experiences, it will try to heal itself with the experience.
modifier.modulargolems.pickup_no_destroy: When a golem attempts to pickup an item and find nowhere to place it, it will not pickup the item instead. It will cause lag if the golem is in a region with lots of items.
modifier.modulargolems.pixie_attack.desc: Summon a pixie with a %s%% chance when attacking. Pixie damage +%s.
modifier.modulargolems.pixie_counteratta: Summon a pixie with a %s%% chance when attacked.
modifier.modulargolems.polarize.desc: Pull enemies in melee mode and push enemies away in ranged/standing mode, deal %s electrical damage constantly.
modifier.modulargolems.poseidite.desc: Deal %s%% more damage to mobs sensitive to water or water based mobs
modifier.modulargolems.projectile_reject: Deflect projectiles. Takes no projectile damage.
modifier.modulargolems.radiation.desc: Inflict %s to attack targets. Damage to radiated target increase by %s per radiation level.
modifier.modulargolems.recycle.desc: Drop golem holder of 0 health when killed. Holder will return to inventory if player is present.
modifier.modulargolems.reformation.desc: Consume iron ingot to gain %s absorption and heal %s. Golem may hold at most %s absorption
Golem will not attack, and will not be targeted for attack.
Shoot lightning spear at multiple targets
modifier.modulargolems.scylla_wave.desc: When attacked, summon waves to push attackers away
modifier.modulargolems.sonic_boom.desc: Golem can use Sonic Boom Attack. If the golem can perform area attack, then Sonic Boom can hit multiple targets.
modifier.modulargolems.soul_collection.d: Collect soul from entities killed and give it to owner
modifier.modulargolems.soul_flame.desc: Get Soul Flame Blade and Soul Flame Thorn enchantment effects. Immune to soul flame damage.
modifier.modulargolems.soul_repair.desc: Repair golem equipments with player's soul energy. Also heal golem with soul energy when health is low
modifier.modulargolems.sticky_caramel.de: Put molten caramel on attack targets
modifier.modulargolems.talented.desc: First of every kind of upgrades with blue arrow will no longer consume upgrade slots (up to 4)
modifier.modulargolems.teleport.desc: Teleport randomly to avoid physical damage. Teleport toward target when attacking. Teleport has %ss cool down.
modifier.modulargolems.tf_damage.desc: Deal %s%% extra damage in twilight forest
modifier.modulargolems.tf_healing.desc: Healing becomes %s%% more in twilight forest
modifier.modulargolems.the_abhorrent.des: Reduce target invulnerability frames on hit
modifier.modulargolems.the_profane.desc: Golem remove %s random positive effects from target on hit
modifier.modulargolems.the_risen.desc: Golem drops holder item with 0 health on death. Golem holder item can still heal when it has no health
modifier.modulargolems.the_terrible.desc: Golem draws bow faster. Shoots %s arrows each toward at most %s targets
modifier.modulargolems.thunder_immune.de: Immune to lightning bolt damage. Attract Lightning. When struck, gain fire resistance for 10 seconds, and heal %s health.
modifier.modulargolems.thunderstorm.desc: Summon thunderstorm to attack multiple targets. When attacked, summon electric bursts around the golem.
modifier.modulargolems.totemic_gold.desc: Deal %s%% more damage to undead mobs
modifier.modulargolems.wroughtnaut.desc: Perform falling attack and create shockwave
modulargolems.config.blacklist: Using blacklist. Click to switch to whitelist.
modulargolems.config.match_item: Match item only. Click to match NBT.
modulargolems.config.match_tag: Match item and NBT. Click to match item only.
modulargolems.config.mode_tooltip: The default mode golem will take when summoned. Does not affect golem in world already. Retrieved golems will take this mode instead of old mode when summoned.
modulargolems.config.pos_original_toolti: If golem is retrieved, summon this golem to the original position. It would not take effect if the golem is fresh. If the original position is too far away, summon would fail.
modulargolems.config.pos_target_tooltip: Summon golem to the position player points to.
modulargolems.config.whitelist: Using whitelist. Click to switch to blacklist.
modulargolems.configuration.allowEditCur: Allow command wand to edit curios of other mobs you own
modulargolems.configuration.armorBypassC: Armor Penetration modifier: chance for damage to bypass armor per level
modulargolems.configuration.barehandRetr: Allow players to retrieve the golems by bare hand
modulargolems.configuration.basePickupRa: Pickup range per level for pickup upgrade
modulargolems.configuration.carminiteTim: Time for the golem to be invincible (in ticks) per level of carminite
modulargolems.configuration.coating: Damage absorbed per level of coating
modulargolems.configuration.compatTFDama: Percentage damage bonus per level of twilight damage
modulargolems.configuration.compatTFHeal: Percentage healing bonus per level of twilight healing
modulargolems.configuration.conduitBoost: Conduit modifier boosts armor when golem is in water
Conduit modifier boosts attack (percentage) when golem is in water
Conduit modifier reduce damage taken when golem is in water (multiplicative)
Conduit modifier boosts speed (percentage) when golem is in water
Conduit modifier boosts toughness when golem is in water
modulargolems.configuration.doEnemyAggro: Make mobs aggro to iron golem automatically aggro to modular golems
modulargolems.configuration.earthquakeAr: Monstrosity Armor Bonus: Monstrosity Earthquake Modifier damage boost
modulargolems.configuration.explosionRes: Percentage damage reduction per level of explosion resistance
modulargolems.configuration.fiery: Percentage damage addition per level of fiery
modulargolems.configuration.laserArmorBo: Harbinger Helmet Bonus: Death Laser damage boost
modulargolems.configuration.magicResista: Percentage damage reduction per level of magic resistance
modulargolems.configuration.manaBoosting: Mana boosting cost per level (of 1 hit)
Percentage damage bonus per level of mana boost
modulargolems.configuration.manaBurstDam: Damage of magic burst as percentage of attack damage
modulargolems.configuration.maxWanderRad: Max golem activity radius before being teleported back
modulargolems.configuration.mechAttack: Attack boost per level of Mechanical Force
modulargolems.configuration.mechMaxFuel: Maximum number of fuel item that can be added at the same time
modulargolems.configuration.mechSpeed: Speed boost per level of Mechanical Mobility
modulargolems.configuration.mendingXpCos: Mending Xp Cost per health point
modulargolems.configuration.missileArmor: Harbinger Chestplate Bonus: Homing Missile damage boost
modulargolems.configuration.pixieAttackP: Probability of summoning a pixie when attacking
modulargolems.configuration.pixiecounter: Probability of summoning a pixie when attacked
modulargolems.configuration.retrieveDist: Max distance to retrieve single golem
modulargolems.configuration.retrieveRang: Max distance to retrieve all golems
modulargolems.configuration.riddenSpeedF: Speed factor for dog golem when ridden by entities
modulargolems.configuration.slicingDropU: Chance for each upgrade to drop when killed by Slicing Axe
modulargolems.configuration.startFollowR:
Max golem activity radius before following player in follow mode
 Default: 10.0
 Range: 1.0 ~ 100.0
modulargolems.configuration.stopWanderRa:
Max golem activity radius before willing to go back to origin in wander mode
 Default: 20.0
 Range: 1.0 ~ 100.0
modulargolems.configuration.strictIntera:
When enabled, the following features will be disabled when player holds item in hand:
- give item to golem or take items from golem by right click
- order dog golem to seat
modulargolems.configuration.summonDistan: Max distance to summon single golem
modulargolems.configuration.targetDamage: Damage bonus for attacking specific type of enemy
modulargolems.configuration.targetResetT: Target reset time after no movement, in ticks
modulargolems.configuration.teleportCool: Teleport cooldown in ticks for avoiding physical damage
modulargolems.configuration.thorn: Percentage damage reflection per level of thorn
modulargolems.configuration.thunderHeal: Healing when thunder immune golems are striked
modulargolems.configuration.title: Modular Golems Configuration
modulargolems.msg.destroy_exp: Golem %s destroyed %s experience because it finds no place to store.
modulargolems.msg.destroy_item: Golem %s destroyed %s items because it finds no place to store.
modulargolems.msg.summon_failed: Failed to summon %s, as target position is too far
modulargolems.slot.arrow_desc: Place arrows here to free up off hand for shields
modulargolems.slot.backup_info: If you have bow and sword, one in main hand and one in backup slot, your golem can switch between them depending on distance to enemies.
modulargolems.title: Modular Golems
modulargolems.tooltip.add_slot: Add %s upgrade slot. Applied on anvil.
modulargolems.tooltip.patrolling: Golem will patrol in a designated way
modulargolems.tooltip.potion_attack: Inflict %s to enemies attacking or attacked.
modulargolems.tooltip.shift: Press SHIFT to show modifier details
modulargolems.tooltip.slicing_enemy: When metal golem kill certain enemies with this axe, drop one random metal golem part
modulargolems.tooltip.slicing_golem: When metal golem kill golems of other players with this axe, drop all parts and each upgrade has %s chance to drop
modulargolems.tooltip.target.default: Default Iron Golem hostile targets: all enemies except creeper.
modulargolems.tooltip.target.name: Rename the item and right click to add the name as entity type or entity type tag to the list
modulargolems.tooltip.target.remove: Sneak right click to remove last entry from the list
modulargolems.tooltip.target.type_add: Right click entity to add entity type to the list
modulargolems.tooltip.target.type_remove: Sneak right click entity to remove entity type from the list
modulargolems.tooltip.target.uuid_add: Right click entity to add entity UUID to the list
modulargolems.tooltip.target.uuid_remove: Sneak right click entity to remove entity UUID from the list
modulargolems.wand.command_right: Target a golem to switch modes. Target entity to command nearby golems to attack it.
modulargolems.wand.command_shift: Click golem to configure inventory and view stats.
modulargolems.wand.config: Right click golem to set config. Right click again to remove. When in offhand, wands would only target golems having this config.
modulargolems.wand.config_other: Not your card. You cannot edit it
modulargolems.wand.err_dim: You cannot add nodes across dimension
modulargolems.wand.err_dist: You cannot add nodes more than 16 blocks apart
modulargolems.wand.path_record: Right click block to add to path, right click again to remove. Shift right click to clear. Path forms a cycle.
modulargolems.wand.retrieve_shift: Target a faraway golem to retrieve it.
modulargolems.wand.rider: Target your dog golem to ride on it. If it's not your golem, you can ride when its owner is riding. When mounted, right click anything to dismount.
modulargolems.wand.squad: Click a golem with config to set it as captain. Click a captain to remove its captain status.
modulargolems.wand.summon_right: Summon one golem to a faraway position pointed by the wand.
modulargolems.wand.summon_shift: Summon all golems from your inventory.
modulargolems.wand.switch: Scroll or use up/down arrow key to switch between modes
patchouli.modulargolems.landing: Welcome to Tinker-like golem assembly and upgrade mod
patchouli.modulargolems.title: Modular Golem Guide
task.modulargolems.summon_golems.desc: Maid will summon golems to attack surrounding hostile mobs
